title: The Music album: 'Blue Danube' and 'Romance'
brief_description: An orchestra conducted by Frederick Feher plays Johann Strauss “Blue Danube” with singers Armanda Chinot and Christine McIntyre in first half, followed by a performance of “Romance” with singers Tandy McKenzie and Alice Avalsian.
description: An orchestra conducted by Frederick Feher plays Johann Strauss “Blue Danube” with singers Armanda Chinot and Christine McIntyre in first half, followed by a performance of “Romance” with singers Tandy McKenzie and Alice Avalsian.
